info.name: SV
info.description:
SV - Simple View of VK 0.7.5

Redesign of header, messages, chatbox, sidebar, background and much more!

thx Michail Nikolayev
info.additionalInfo:
Found a bug? Have a question? Message me: https://vk.com/stason2804

Update:

v0.7.5 - February 3, 2021
-fixed notification button

v0.7.4 - December 31, 2020
-fixed audio player

v0.7.3 - December 23, 2020
-fixed svg icons

v0.7.1 - December 19, 2020
-the logo is repainted white
-a few bug fixes

v0.7.0 - December 18, 2020
-optimized for new design

v0.6.2 - October 9, 2020
-a few bug fixes in #header and #audio_player

v0.6.0 - July 16, 2020
-a few bug fixes
-remove nav menu

-а block of popular apps has been removed.

-change header

-small fix bugs

-fixed animation of music playback... Again...
